subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Panathinaikos of Athens has been ordered to play four home games in the Euroleague behind closed doors and fined $131,000 for offenses during its quarterfinal series against Barcelona.
snippet: Panathinaikos of Athens has been ordered to play four home games in the Euroleague behind closed doors and fined $131,000 for offenses during its quarterfinal series against Barcelona.
